item.title: Learn to Love Pain
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1593" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Nathan Phillips on Flickr"][/caption]

What if you could get past pain and discomfort by accepting it and relaxing into it? I don’t mean that the pain goes away, but rather that you become okay with it. You still feel it, but it doesn’t bother you. You can get on with whatever it is you’re doing.
